EmailTemplate.subject: Your LSTM Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Student_Programme__c.Student__c},
RE: Your application for MSc {!Student_Programme__c.Programme__c}
Warm Greetings from all at LSTM.
We noticed that you have nearly completed your application for MSc {!Student_Programme__c.Programme__c} but at the moment your application is still in DRAFT status. Is there anything we can help with to finish your application? If you are ready to send us your application, please log into MyLSTM and press the submit button so we can start the review process for you. Your username is your email address. If you can't remember your password, please use the 'Forgot your password?' facility on the MyLSTM login page.
Exciting News – you may have seen on the news that we have just had a visit from Bill Gates, Co-founder of Microsoft and the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation along with Rt. Hon George Osborne MP to announce the Ross Fund. This £3Billion fund will be used to support the global fight against Malaria and other infectious diseases. See more here.
Fees Price Freeze – MSc fees for September 2016 have been set and we are delighted to confirm there is a considerable reduction in the overseas fee. The MSc fee is now £15,300. All programme fees are on our website fees page.
The Module Catalogue and the Programme Handbook for this year are on the course webpages to give you further information. http://www.lstmed.ac.uk/study/courses
If you need any further information, we would be delighted to hear from you.
Best wishes
LSTM MSc Admissions Team
